import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Card,Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import axios from "axios"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { listSingleProduct } from "../actions/productActions" import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import Message from '../components/Message'; const ProductScreen = (props) => { //const product = products.find((p => p._id === props.match.params.id)) const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productDetail = useSelector(state => state.productDetail) const { loading, error, product } = productDetail; useEffect(() => { dispatch(listSingleProduct(props.match.params.id)) },[dispatch]) return ( <> Go Back { loading ? : error ? {error}:(

{ product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock >0 ?"In Stock":"Out of Stock"} ) } ) } export default ProductScreen
